entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
